projects.title: Online Examination System
projects.desc: This project was made as final year assignment in team of three. My role in this project was at backend. Technologies used in this project are HTML, CSS and JavaScript and Bootstrap framework for frontEnd and PHP as backend and MySQL as Database.

projects.title: Foodies
projects.desc: A simple food ordering web application where one can be registered as reatiler to sell his/her own product or can be registered as consumer where he/she can order.

projects.title: Portfolio
projects.desc: This is my Portfolio. This project is built on ReactJS to showcase my reactjs skills.

projects.title: Markdown Bolg
projects.desc: I made this project when I learnt MERN Stack. The User need to register to write a blog. The blog can be written or edited as markdown text with full markdown support.

projects.title: Coffee
projects.desc: This is a coffee website. I made this project to practice some advance features of CSS and JS like Navigation Bar and media queries.

projects.title: Weather App
projects.desc: This is a small weather application which tell the weather report by name. Technologies used in this aplication are HTML, CSS and JavaScript. I made this project to learn API calls and DOM manipulation in JS. Open weather API is used in this project

projects.title: Tic-Tak-Toe Game
projects.desc: This is a simple game Tic-Tac-Toe. I made this project to learn DOM manipulation and some dynamic behaviour of JS.

projects.title: Bolg Site
projects.desc: I made this project when I learnt flask framework of python. Technologies used in this project are HTML, CSS and JavaScript and Bootstrap framework for frontEnd and Python as backend and MySQL as Database.
